scripts.construct: pnpm run download && pnpm run wasm
scripts.check: cargo check --target "$(rustc -vV | grep host | (IFS=" "; read -r key value; echo $value))" --target wasm32-unknown-unknown
scripts.lint: cargo clippy --target "$(rustc -vV | grep host | (IFS=" "; read -r key value; echo $value))" --target wasm32-unknown-unknown -- -D warnings
